text: Martin Ádám (born 6 November 1994) is a Hungarian football player who currently plays for Paksi FC. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="9" valign="center"|Vasas |- |2012–13 |11||0||2||0||4||0||–||–||17||0 |- |2013–14 |18||4||0||0||5||0||–||–||23||4 |- |2014–15 |23||7||1||0||5||1||–||–||29||8 |- |2015–16 |21||2||2||0||–||–||–||–||23||2 |- |2016–17 |24||7||6||1||–||–||–||–||30||8 |- |2017–18 |27||2||1||0||–||–||2||0||30||2 |- |2018–19 |15||3||2||3||–||–||–||–||17||6 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||139||25||14||4||14||1||2||0||169||30 |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Kaposvár |- |2018–19 |13||8||1||0||–||–||–||–||14||8 |- |2019–20 |30||5||2||1||–||–||–||–||32||6 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||43||13||3||1||0||0||0||0||46||14 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Career Total | |182||38||17||5||14||1||2||0||215||44 |} Updated to games played as of 27 June 2020. ==References== *Profile at MLSZ *Soccerway Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungary under-21 international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Kaposvári Rákóczi FC players Category:Vasas SC players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Paksi FC players
